Description:
Under Offer
Look no further - An admirable place to start, downsize or even invest!
This near new unit is positioned at the front of the block with its own street frontage and driveway and is only one of four on the block!
Comprising of 2 plentiful bedrooms with built in robes plus a favourable master bedroom with triple built in robes and ensuite which also doubles as a function family bathroom with the added bonus of a separate toilet and laundry. You'll love the modern kitchen where you will find stainless steel gas appliances including a dishwasher and amble amounts of cupboard space all whilst overlooking the meals area. The split system heating and cooling provides you with comfort in your own home during all seasons.
When you see the low maintenance courtyard this property has to offer along with the remote-access double garage with internal access, you'll want to put pen to paper!

Description:
THE SECRET COTTAGE
Privately located behind a beautiful front hedge lies this charming cottage on a corner allotment of 612sqm at the quiet end of Park Road.
Beginning at the front porch you are greeted by a perfect spot to relax, read a book and even admire your front garden, stepping inside you are immediately captured by the elegant and traditional period features of ornate cornices, high ceilings, picture rails, original floor boards, pendant lighting and the rare but stunning original doors and cabinetry.
Comprising three sizeable bedrooms a generous living area to the front of the home, traditional galley kitchen with dishwasher and gas stove plus adjoining meals area, central main bathroom with separate toilet, heaps of storage cupboards located around the house, mud room leading through to spacious laundry, gorgeous central fireplace, ducted heating throughout and s/s air conditioner. Step outside to the backyard which is awaiting a gardeners touch but still boasts plenty of room for the kids to play, plus a separate driveway leading to double l/u garage for extra storage.
Located across from the Crib point Reserve & Swimming pool this well loved homed is in excellent original condition, but with some TLC a masterpiece will be rediscovered.
Please Note: Cubby house, Pot plants and window drapes are not included in the Sale.
AUCTION: Saturday September 16th 2017 commencing at 1:00PM.
TERMS: 10% Deposit. Balance 30/60/90 Days, Subject to Tenancy.

Description:
The Perfect Family Package With Dual-Living On 1/4 Acre (Approx.)
With proportions that will surprise and delight, this unique property has been lovingly maintained and semi-modernised, meaning there is little to do except move in and begin enjoying this fabulous lifestyle location.
Main residence:
~ Updated only 18 months ago, with fresh paint, large format tiles and main bathroom with rain-head shower and separate bath.
~ An attractive open plan living, dining and kitchen is the much-loved heart of the home and is perfect for relaxed family living and entertaining.
~ The country-inspired kitchen with plenty of bench & cupboard space and gas appliances means mealtimes will be a pleasure.
~ Wood combustion heater and air-conditioning in the living zone.
~ Making entertaining a breeze, the sheltered alfresco integrates easily with the outdoor kitchen offering a built-in Rinnai BBQ, this private area is the perfect spot to survey the peaceful fernery and bamboo nuances.
~ Master bedroom featuring triple robes, ceiling fans and direct access to the outdoor alfresco. Whilst the second bedroom also offers built-in-robes and a ceiling fan.
~ Third bedroom, study or studio with provisions to work from home (STCA.)
~ Features that make this superb property an even more attractive prospect includes a single garage with an abundance of storage, water tanks, wood storage and a single carport to store a boat or caravan.
Dependents Unit:
~ Only 4 years old.
~ Two spacious bedrooms with triple robes and ceiling fans.
~ Open plan living and dining room with wood combustion heater.
~ Kitchenette offering breakfast bar and plenty of storage.
~ Climate controlled by s/system heating + cooling.
~ Decked outdoor entertaining area and BBQ hut, surrounded by lush greenery and teaming with flower beds and an established fernery.
In a location where everything is easy to get to, it offers the opportunity to live in this central and highly sought-after suburb, where shops, schools and transport are all nearby.

Address: 484 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
Rare lifestyle property
Set on a Huge 1.16 Acres (approx.) This fully renovated home has everything a family could need, from a great size shed and home to the huge cleared block, this property has endless potential.
If you are looking for the flexibility of working from home, this property offers you the space for a home business, from a hairdresser's salon to an artist space or even just the space to house all the toys.
Features Include
- 4 Double bedrooms, Master with BIR and newly renovated ensuite.
- Central light filled Kitchen with brand new s/s appliances including under bench oven, gas stove and range hood.
- Freshly painted, new curtains and new floor boards throughout & split system heating/cooling to the living area.
- Huge garage with work shop.
Located only minutes away from Crib Point Train Station and school, this property is a must to inspect.
Open every Saturday or call now to book a private inspection.

Description:
Spacious Comfort & Heart-Warming Appeal On 1/4 Acre (Approx.)
UNDER OFFER IN 2 WEEKS | Nestled in a whisper quiet cul-de-sac, there's plenty to love about this character filled residence. With a solid, well-constructed exterior and beautifully maintained interiors, this family-friendly residence is ready to move in and enjoy now, or there's plenty of scope to renovate or update at your leisure.
~ The master bedroom features a walk-in-robe and ensuite/powder room, with the luxury of a second parents retreat offering built-in's and a semi-ensuite.
~ An easy flow layout is evident with open-plan living and dining, which leads to a functional kitchen offering gas cooking and a double fridge cavity.
~ Extending the inside entertaining and dining to outside is a covered alfresco, the perfect stage for a BBQ setup, or an outdoor lounge set from which to watch little ones play in the lusciously green backyard.
~ Graced with cathedral ceilings, slate flooring and an abundance of windows which allow glorious winter sunshine to stream in.
~ Climate controlled by split system heating & cooling.
~ The family-focused bathroom features a corner spa and double vanity, catering to families with little ones while an extensive laundry creates added convenience.
~ Substantial storage and flexibility comes courtesy of a 1.5 vehicle carport and large 9x6 shed with power.
With an abundance of lifestyle activities on offer, it's easy to see why this idyllic location is so popular. It's just a short commute to leading schools, shops, transport and nature reserves for those who enjoy the great outdoors.

Description:
Enchanting & Contemporary
Ticking all the boxes, this charming property oozes character!
Spread over 1039msq approx. this family home is within easy reach of the foreshore, local transport, wineries, shops and schools. The large block allows you plenty of space to play both inside and out in this freshly updated, quality home.
Three spacious bedrooms, (master with ensuite), renovated family bathroom and boasting two large light filled living/dining zones, complimented by an open plan kitchen. Featuring ample bench space, great storage and modern appliances, this kitchen will make entertaining a pleasure.
The master bedroom enjoys a decadent ensuite with walk in robe, whilst further bedrooms will accommodate everyone with ease, all serviced by a centrally placed updated main bathroom with a bath.
Outside, an undercover decked entertaining area, where you can enjoy a quiet BBQ whilst you sit and watch the kids playing in the backyard, is perfect to accommodate all your toys and doubles as further living space. The man of the house will love the huge garage that has been 'decked out' as a man cave. The garage features power, a feature bar, a lockable storage area and a pergola area. The entire yard is neatly and attractively landscaped and children's play equipment allowing every space to be well utilised.
Additional features include, two split systems, central wood heater, 10 x solar panels and LED lighting.

Address: 337 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
1,927m2 LAND IN PRIME LOCATION!
Wow, such a unique opportunity to purchase a big block of land in a prime location of Crib Point.
Currently, this block comes with bitumen driveway leading to 13 car spaces and an established clinic with 7 consulting rooms, staff room, reception and waiting room air conditioned and wheel chair friendly ramps.
The possibilities for this property are endless, you could build the new Family home you have always wanted, convert the building to the ever in demand, childcare facility or if you're a practicing physiotherapist, chiropractor, masseuse, myotherapist, yoga teacher etc looking for a new home for your business, this could very well be it!
Properties like this will be hard to find in the future, especially located in the heart of Crib Point, close to local transport, shops and schools.
As an added bonus you can subdivide the land of 1,927m2 at the buyers' responsibility (S.T.C.A)
If you would like further information please contact, Exclusive Agent, Richard Whitehead on 0412 328 718

Description:
Past, Present and Future Appeal On 1,307sqm (Approx.)
Rarely does an exceptional opportunity like this present itself for buyers with vision and imagination seeking to renovate and potentially extend an original c1920's cottage (STCA.)
~ Occupying a large corner allotment of approximately 1,307sqm with potential to sub-divide (STCA.)
~ Gracious proportions define the formal living room and all three of the bedrooms. While a sunroom and entry-foyer are welcomed additions to this family-friendly home.
~ The master bedroom offers an updated ensuite, lounge room with original fire place & ornamental stove and a dressing room.
~ Combined dining room and kitchen, plus a separate laundry for added convenience.
~ Brimming with classic appeal and graced with a host of traditional features, such as 12ft ceilings and sash windows.
~ Further features include gas heating and an outdoor storage room.
Offering a walk-to-everywhere lifestyle and enjoying a prime position in this family oriented community, this delightful property is close to all the conveniences on offer. With leading schools, transport and the recreation reserve located across the street, offering a heated swimming pool and sporting grounds.

Description:
INVEST OR NEST!
This solid brick veneer unit is located in a very spacious complex off the quiet and convenient Park Road in Crib Point.
Comprising two generous bedrooms both with BIR's, large living area with gas wall furnace overlooking the luscious front yard, functional galley kitchen leading to meals area, central main bathroom with bath, separate toilet room and separate laundry, generous outdoor areas and large garden shed to rear plus your own covered car space.
This cosy home is currently tenanted and is returning $956 per calendar month, a perfect buy for investors wanting to add to their portfolio or first home buyers needing an entry into the ever growing property market.
Just a short stroll to two local Primary Schools, the Cyril Fox Reserve and the Crib point swimming pool, this unit represents exceptional value at $295,000
For further details, please contact Richard Whitehead on 0412 328 718.

Address: 348 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
Character and Potential make a Winning Combination!
AUCTION THIS SATURDAY! 1:00PM
Situated on a massive 1086m2 (approx) block, this home is being offered for sale for the first time ever!
Loved and adored by the same family for more than 60 years this 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home is ripe and ready for you to put your own stamp on it. Offering a formal lounge, formal dining, central kitchen, sunroom, double tandem garage, single carport, several garden sheds and an in-ground pool all the basics are already here.
Some repairs and updating would really make this a beautiful home. Original features throughout the home and an array of mature fruit trees, Camellias, Wisteria, roses and much, much more.
With public transport nearby, St Josephs Catholic Primary School, Crib Point Primary and HMAS Cerberus just around the corner, local shops within walking distance and a choice of stunning beaches only a few minutes away Crib Point is fast becoming the location of choice for astute purchaser.
Inspect by appointment or as advertised.

Description:
A Perfect Market Entry Or Investment With Updated Interiors On 1,177sqm (Approx.)
UNDER OFFER AT THE FIRST OPEN HOME | Freshly renovated from top-to-bottom, this three bedroom residence promises a lifestyle of privacy and convenience.
Located in a quiet and leafy pocket of Crib Point, only 200m to the town centre and close to transport, sporting grounds and HMAS Cerberus Naval Base.
~ A gas log heater in the family room keeps you warm and cozy during these winter months. While newly laid carpets and a ceiling fan are welcomed additions to this spacious living zone.
~ A generous kitchen and meals area has been fitted with plenty of storage, stainless steel appliances and a dishwasher.
~ Main bathroom offers a walk-in shower and separate bath.
~ The sizable rear yard is packed with features, including a wood shed, chook pen and a small paddock (currently home to a pet goat.)
~ Side access to a large shed with power.

Address: 323 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
Tastefully Renovated Residence With Two-Driveways On 1,200sqm (Approx.)
Relaxed living and entertaining comes naturally in this sensational home with a generous floorplan that will be a perfect match for families of all shapes and sizes.
Only moments to local shops and transport, this is an outstanding opportunity to indulge your zest for lifestyle living in a brilliant Peninsula location.
~ Three bedrooms with robes + master bedroom offering a stylish ensuite with walk-in shower.
~ Designed with maximum efficiency in mind, the hostess kitchen, which is fitted with quality appliances and stone benchtops, is yet another example of the superb update that this home has undergone.
~ Spacious lounge and dining room are complemented by ceiling cornices.
~ Evaporative cooling throughout.
~ The floorplan smoothly flows outdoors to an inviting and sheltered alfresco, presenting a range of entertaining possibilities year round.
~ Large shed with power, garden shed and side access.
~ A second driveway allows plenty of access to the property to store a truck, boat or caravan.

Address: 518 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
Charismatic Home With Enticing Dimensions On 1/4 Acre
Held by only one family since it was built in 1974, this dearly loved home offers light and bright family-sized comfort on a generous land size of 1090sqm (approx.)
~ Ready to move in and enjoy while providing scope to flaunt your decorative flair.
~ All bedrooms are spacious, especially the master suite which has been fitted with an ensuite, walk-in-robe and built-in-robes. Bedroom 2 also features a walk-in-robe.
~ The well-designed floorplan is focused around a generous living space with a casual dining area and a separate lounge room which flows to the covered alfresco.
~ A functional kitchen is the heart of the home, featuring custom-cabinetry, Dishlex dishwasher and a gas cooktop.
~ Gas heating, s/system heating + cooling and gas wood heater.
~ Side access to store a boat/caravan behind secure gates, shed with power + single carport.
~ Established gardens, veggie patches and a variety of fruit trees.
Close to Bittern village shops, cafes and schools, this central location presents the best of both worlds. It offers easy access to the city via Peninsula Link and just a short drive to local favourites, from the likes of Balnarring beach down to Merricks General Store and beyond.

Description:
Charisma, Charm and Considerable Scope On 1/2 Acre (Approx.)
Displaying a substantial floor plan that is both versatile and functional, and with a generous land size of approximately 1975sqm, there is plenty of room to live, laugh and play. It will be hard not to fall in love at first sight.
~ Master bedroom offers ensuite, ceiling fan and plenty of storage options, including walk-in-robe & built-in-robes.
~ Two remaining bedrooms offer built-in-robes and ceiling fan.
~ The upper level features a blank canvas which can be converted into a second master suite or dependents quarters. Offering a desirable north-facing balcony and another overlooking the rear yard, s/system heating + cooling and all plumbing is connected, offering plenty of scope and versatility to cater for different family needs.
~ Delight in a spacious, light-filled kitchen, complete with a dishwasher and gas cooktop.
~ Split system cooling in living zones and ducted heating throughout.
~ A large formal living room bathes in northern sunlight, while the games room is the ultimate teen retreat.
~ The private, resort-style outdoors define this impressive home. From the enclosed alfresco to the level lawn, poolside deck and in-ground swimming pool - it's an incredible space that entertainers will love.
~ Additional noteworthy features include a double carport and ample shedding/storage.
A gateway to all that the Mornington Peninsula has to offer, including coastal walking tracks, boutique cafés and leading schools.
